newsitem.title: UKRAINE: Ukraine 3-mo T-bills yld 57.30 pct,up vs last sale.
newsitem.headline: Ukraine 3-mo T-bills yld 57.30 pct,up vs last sale.

text.p: The average yield at the latest auction of three-month discount treasury bills rose to 57.30 percent from 57.14 percent at the last sale, a Ukrainian central bank official said on Friday.
Results of Thursday's auction, compared to the last issue of
Amount sold 1.153 trillion UAK 2.098 trillion UAK
Actual amount raised 1.009 trillion UAK 1.836 trillion UAK
Average price 8.750 million UAK 8.753 million UAK
Cut-off price 8.750 million UAK 8.750 million UAK
Ukraine's central bank sold 115,392 T-bills, of which 83,392 were competitive and 32,000 were non-competitive bids, the bank official said.
The next auction of discount three-month T-bills will be August 27. --Kiev Newsroom +380 33 229 2264
